00051 template< class T >
00052 class TagScalarVector
00053     :   public Tag

00055 public:

00142 int
00143 TagScalarVector< T >::size() const

00162 template< class T >
00163 void
00164 TagScalarVector< T >::setValue( const T & v )
00165 {
00166     if( m_constraint )
00167     {
00168         if( !m_constraint->check( v ) )
00169             throw Exception( QString( "Invalid value: \"%1\". "
00170                 "Value must match to the constraint." )
00171                     .arg( Format< T >::toString( v ) ) );
00172     }
00173 
00174     m_values.push_back( v );
00175 
00176     setDefined();
00177 }
00178 
00179 template< class T >
00180 void
00181 TagScalarVector< T >::setValues( const ValuesVector & v )
00182 {
00183     m_values = v;
00184 
00185     setDefined();
00186 }
00187 
00188 template< class T >
00189 void
00190 TagScalarVector< T >::queryOptValues( ValuesVector & receiver )
00191 {
00192     if( isDefined() )
00193         receiver = m_values;
00194 }

00197 void
00198 TagScalarVector< T >::setConstraint( Constraint< T > * c )
00199 {
00200     m_constraint = c;

00203 template< class T >
00204 QString
00205 TagScalarVector< T >::print( int indent ) const
00206 {
00207     QString result;
00208 
00209     if( isDefined() )
00210     {
00211         for( int i = 0; i < indent; ++i )
00212             result.append( QLatin1String( "\t" ) );
00213 
00214         result.append( QLatin1String( "{" ) );
00215         result.append( name() );
00216 
00217         foreach( T v, m_values )
00218         {
00219             result.append( QLatin1String( " " ) );
00220 
00221             QString value = Format< T >::toString( v );
00222             value = toQtConfFileFormat( value );
00223 
00224             result.append( value );
00225         }
00226 
00227         if( !children().isEmpty() )
00228         {
00229             result.append( QLatin1String( "\n" ) );
00230 
00231             foreach( Tag * tag, children() )
00232                 result.append( tag->print( indent + 1 ) );
00233 
00234             for( int i = 0; i < indent; ++i )
00235                 result.append( QLatin1String( "\t" ) );
00236         }
00237 
00238         result.append( QLatin1String( "}\n" ) );
00239     }
00240 
00241     return result;
00242 }

00244 template< class T >
00245 void
00246 TagScalarVector< T >::onStart( const ParserInfo & info )
00247 {
00248     Q_UNUSED( info )
00249 }
00250 
00251 template< class T >
00252 void
00253 TagScalarVector< T >::onFinish( const ParserInfo & info )
00254 {
00255     foreach( Tag * tag, children() )
00256     {
00257         if( tag->isMandatory() && !tag->isDefined() )
00258             throw Exception( QString( "Undefined child mandatory tag: \"%1\". "
00259                 "Where parent is: \"%2\". "
00260                 "In file \"%3\" on line %4." )
00261                     .arg( tag->name() )
00262                     .arg( name() )
00263                     .arg( info.fileName() )
00264                     .arg( info.lineNumber() ) );
00265     }
00266 }
00267 
00268 template< class T >
00269 void
00270 TagScalarVector< T >::onString( const ParserInfo & info,
00271     const QString & str )
00272 {
00273     T value = Format< T >::fromString( info, str );
00274 
00275     if( m_constraint )
00276     {
00277         if( !m_constraint->check( value ) )
00278             throw Exception( QString( "Invalid value: \"%1\". "
00279                 "Value must match to the constraint. "
00280                 "In file \"%2\" on line %3." )
00281                     .arg( str )
00282                     .arg( info.fileName() )
00283                     .arg( info.lineNumber() ) );
00284     }
00285 
00286     m_values.push_back( value );
00287 
00288     setDefined();
00289 }
